(2) Parameter context NOTES:
Set "events" parameter to the number of events sent per second to the broker. This value is calculated from the number of concurrent tasks configured at the prometheus-collector's GenerateJSONData processor (the number of timeseries samples generated by the processor).

(3) IMPORTANT:
Go to "prometheus-collector" process group. Select "RequestPrometheusAPI" and set concurrent tasks vakue to the specified value for the "events" parameter in the context

(1) Parameter context NOTES:
Create new parameter context. Apply context to all executed process groups

(4) IMPORTANT:
Remember to enable all the controller services
Split into individual time series samples
